9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"I twisted the garlands for the Hadi of the Prophet, then he did not assume Ihram, nor did he avoid any clothing

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَقْلِيدِ الْهَدْىِ لِلْمُقِيمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Garlanding The Hadi Fr The Resident
